name: Wordup!
description: Wordup is a simple to use dictionary app which uses Wordnik.coms API as back-end. The app is still in its beta stage and hence many features might be missing.   The updates should almost arrive every 2 weeks, if everything goes well.   Please let me know what you think about Wordup! Your suggestions would help in the development of this app.   Kindly, leave a rating if you like it!
